term.title: hot atom

item.text: An atom in an excited energy state or having kinetic energy above the ambient thermal level, usually as a result of nuclear processes.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2520 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
